mapper.select: SELECT genderid labelId,SUM(pv) pv,SUM(uv) uv,SUM(ip) ip,`value` `name` FROM `mllib_gender_data` mgd JOIN `common_gender` cg ON mgd.genderid = cg.id WHERE `day` BETWEEN '2016-12-01' AND '2016-12-07' GROUP BY genderid

SELECT channelid labelId,SUM(pv) pv,SUM(uv) uv,SUM(ip) ip,`value` `name` FROM `mllib_channel_data` mcd JOIN `common_channel` cc ON mcd.channelid = cc.id WHERE `day` BETWEEN '2016-12-01' AND '2016-12-07' GROUP BY channelid
